short_desc: Receives and distributes donations for 2012 Hurricane Sandy.Gifts to the American Red Cross will support disaster relief efforts to help those affected by the Hurricare Sandy. On those rare occasions when donations exceed American Red Cross expenses for .....more
description: Receives and distributes donations for 2012 Hurricane Sandy.Gifts to the American Red Cross will support disaster relief efforts to help those affected by the Hurricare Sandy. On those rare occasions when donations exceed American Red Cross expenses for a specific disaster, contributions are used to prepare for and serve victims of other disasters.
